Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships in the mythology surrounding Horus, Isis, and Osiris?
Options:
A. a) Horus is the son of Isis and Osiris
B. b) Isis is the wife of Osiris
C. c) Osiris is the father of Horus
D. d) All of the above

Which characters are related in the mythology surrounding Horus?
Options:
A. Horus
B. Isis
C. Nephthys
D. All of the above

Which of the following statements correctly describe the relationships between Hathor, Horus, and Isis in Egyptian mythology?
Options:
A. a) Hathor is the lover of Horus.
B. b) Horus is the son of Isis.
C. c) Isis is a goddess associated with motherhood.
D. d) Hathor is the sister of Isis.
Correct Answer: a) Hathor is the lover of Horus. and b) Horus is the son of Isis.

Question & Options:
Which relationships are accurately described in Egyptian mythology?
Options:
A. Hathor is the lover of Horus
B. Horus is the son of Osiris
C. Osiris is the god of the underworld
D. Horus is a sky god
Correct Answer: Hathor is the lover of Horus, Horus is the son of Osiris

Options:
A. a) Thoth is the brother of Horus.
B. b) Horus is the son of Isis.
C. c) Isis is the mother of Horus.
D. d) All of the above

Which of the following statements is true regarding the relationships between Thoth, Horus, and Osiris?
Options:
A. a) Thoth is the brother of Horus.
B. b) Horus is the son of Osiris.
C. c) Osiris is the father of Thoth.
D. d) Horus is associated with the sky.
Correct Answer: a) Thoth is the brother of Horus. and b) Horus is the son of Osiris.

Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the relationships between Urshu, Set, and Osiris?
Options:
A. a) Urshu is the architect of Set.
B. b) Set is the brother of Osiris.
C. c) Osiris is the king of Egypt.
D. d) Urshu is the king of Egypt.
Correct Answer: a) Urshu is the architect of Set., b) Set is the brother of Osiris., c) Osiris is the king of Egypt.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships among Astarte, Set, and Osiris?
Options:
A. Astarte is a goddess of war loyal to Set.
B. Set is the brother of Osiris.
C. Astarte is the queen of Egypt.
D. Set is associated with the desert.
Correct Answer: Astarte is a goddess of war loyal to Set. and Set is the brother of Osiris. and Set is associated with the desert.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships among Bek, Horus, and Osiris in the context of Egyptian mythology?
Options:
A. a) Bek is an ally of Horus.
B. b) Horus is the son of Osiris.
C. c) Osiris is known as the God of Air.
D. d) Horus is a significant figure in Egyptian mythology.
Correct Answer: a) Bek is an ally of Horus. and b) Horus is the son of Osiris.
